title: STUDENT ACTIVITIES
content: Students of the Indonesian Land Transportation Polytechnic (PTDI-STTD) actively participate in various activities that support self-development and professionalism. On November 23-24, 2024, they participated in the 10th FOKRI GAMES at the Meteorology, Climatology, and Geophysics College (STMKG), winning first place in the Adzan and Musabaqah Hifdzil Qur'an 5 Juz competitions. Additionally, students engage in social activities such as drug prevention outreach under the theme "Campus on the Move, Together Against Drugs for a Bright Indonesia." These activities demonstrate PTDI-STTD students' commitment to developing academic competence, social skills, and making positive contributions to society.
